definition: lit. hiding the moon, shaming the flowers (idiom)/fig. female beauty exceeding even that of the natural world
to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct

sentences.english: The girl's beauty would put the flowers to shame.
sentences.chinese: 这女子真有沉鱼落雁之容，闭月羞花之貌。
